text: "I Still Miss You" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music singer Keith Anderson. It was released in January 2008 as the second single from his album C'mon!, which was released on August 5, 2008. ==Music video== The music video premiered on CMT on May 9, 2008. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of June 13, 2008. ==References== Category:2008 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Country songs Category:Keith Anderson songs
title: I Still Miss You
